meanings.definition: Very skilled or proficient at something.
meanings.sent1: She is an adept pianist, playing beautifully at the recital.
meanings.sent2: The artist is adept at painting landscapes with great detail.
meanings.sent3: The adept chef accidentally added too much salt to the soup, making it inedible.
meanings.sent4: Her adept handling of the situation calmed everyone down in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The adept magician amazed the audience with his incredible tricks.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled or proficient at something.
meanings.sent1: The adept in the kitchen whipped up a delicious meal in no time.
meanings.sent2: He sought advice from the adept to improve his golf swing.
meanings.sent3: The adept of puzzles quickly solved the riddle with ease.
meanings.sent4: She was an adept in negotiation, always getting the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The adept of disguise could blend into any crowd effortlessly.
